mapper.select: SELECT M.monthVal AS month, IFNULL(I.inbound, 0) AS inbound, IFNULL(O.outbound, 0) AS outbound, IFNULL(N.inventory,0) AS inventory FROM ( SELECT 1 AS monthVal UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 UNION ALL SELECT 10 UNION ALL SELECT 11 UNION ALL SELECT 12 ) AS M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MONTH(incoming_date) AS m, SUM(quantity) AS inbound FROM Incoming GROUP BY MONTH(incoming_date) ) I ON (M.monthVal = I.m) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MONTH(outgoing_date) AS m, SUM(quantity) AS outbound FROM Outgoing GROUP BY MONTH(outgoing_date) ) O ON (M.monthVal = O.m) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MONTH(last_updated) AS m, SUM(quantity) AS inventory FROM Warehouse_Inventory GROUP BY MONTH(last_updated) ) N ON (M.monthVal = N.m) ORDER BY M.monthVal

SELECT W.name AS warehouseName, IFNULL(SUM(WI.quantity), 0) AS totalQuantity FROM Warehouse_Inventory WI INNER JOIN Warehouses W ON WI.warehouse_id = W.warehouse_id GROUP BY W.warehouse_id ORDER BY W.warehouse_id

SELECT C.name AS categoryName, IFNULL(SUM(WI.quantity), 0) AS totalQuantity FROM Warehouse_Inventory WI INNER JOIN Products P ON WI.product_id = P.product_id INNER JOIN Categories C ON P.category_id = C.category_id GROUP BY C.category_id ORDER BY C.category_id
SELECT MONTH(order_date) AS month, COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM Orders GROUP BY MONTH(order_date) ORDER BY MONTH(order_date)
